meanings.definition: Characterized by causing problems or difficulties.
meanings.sent1: The troublesome student often disrupted the class.
meanings.sent2: The old car was troublesome to start in the cold mornings.
meanings.sent3: The troublesome squirrel kept stealing nuts from the bird feeder.
meanings.sent4: The troublesome relationship between the two countries led to tension.
meanings.sent5: The troublesome path through the forest was full of obstacles.
